Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

OOC: Please add the new Destron base to the events page, Zardus.  Its in 
Syria.

:::Ramjet/Wheeljack/Vulois/Time Warp:::

Ramjet: The one extremely close to us belongs to the Trainers.  They are led 
by a bot named Prebon.  They are powerful, and are enemies of the Maximals 
and Alliance.  The other one is the Blackfortress, the base a large faction 
of Predacons.  There are three Predacon leaders there, and i think we might 
be able to work out an Alliance with them.
~~~~~
Wheeljack: I'd say a sloping, hill-type shape.(Thanks for the idea Zardus!)
~~~~~
Vulois: Yes, lets. I think we should first go to the Maximals, for they will 
be the most likely to cooperate.  Even so, there are a lot of warlike 
Maximals, so be ready for anything.
::he walks out of his cave and starts flying to the CF::
~~~~~
::Time Warp was releived that they were friends, until he heard what they 
said about Infectra::
Time Warp: Infectra?! In the Alliance?! I didnt know her very well, but she 
definately wasnt Alliance material!  Lets get out of here Airbomber, these 
guys are fools.

--part1_9a.118acaae.27e5378d_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
